description: This header file defines the API functions related to DBus messaging for the OvsAgent component, including initialization, shutdown, component discovery, parameter retrieval, and resource cleanup.
external_methods: ccsp_base_api.h (undefined methods, included for type definitions)

methods.name: Cosa_Shutdown
methods.description: Shuts down the OvsAgent API subsystem.

methods.name: Cosa_FindDestComp
methods.description: Retrieves the destination component name and path for a given namespace.

methods.name: Cosa_GetParamValues
methods.description: Fetches parameter values from a specified component.

methods.name: Cosa_FreeParamValues
methods.description: Frees memory allocated for parameter values.
